column1: It  is  thereafter,  the  petitioner  has  filed  this  second  Relisting
Application dated 16.10.2017 before this Court seeking:

column2: to substitute the petitioner as the legal representative
in place of the deceased 2B defendant;
to set aside the order of abatement dated 24.02.2014
